data.title: Hotel Hansa, Offenbach am Main
data.meta_description: Unser Hotel Hansa befindet sich seit 1992 im Familienbesitz und liegt im Offenbacher Finanz- und Dienstleistungsstadtteil Kaiserlei. Ob Sie nun geschäftlich oder privat in Offenbach und Frankfurt am Main unterwegs sind, unser Haus steht Ihnen gerne für ihren Aufenthalt zur Verfügung.
data.text:
we welcome you to our privately run Hotel Hansa in Offenbach am Main. Since 1992 our Hotel Hansa has been family-owned since 1992 and is located in the Offenbach financial and service district Kaiserlei. The Kaiserleikreisel forms the link between Offenbach and Frankfurt am Main. The convenient but quiet location of our house allows you to get to your destination quickly, easily and comfortably.

Whether you are in Offenbach or Frankfurt am Main for business or pleasure, our house is at your disposal for your stay. Our rooms and the breakfast room are furnished with a cozy and timeless ambience and invite you to relax and linger.

Start your day with a nice hot cup of coffee and our rich breakfast from the buffet

Enjoy a wonderful, relaxing time in our Hotel Hansa.

Your Hosts

Family Operhalski

Read what our guests have experienced at the Hotel Hansa Offenbach. Authentic, personal, uncensored and above all, of real guests. We are happy about constructive criticism, which we take very seriously. It helps us to constantly adapt our service to the needs of our guests. If our guests rate us "very good" we are very proud of it because it is the reward for our daily work.
